description: This file defines a Kotlin object `SampleRepository` which serves as a static in-memory data repository for a media app. It provides categorized media items (recommendations, top picks, recently added) and banner backgrounds for the home screen, along with methods for retrieving and searching media items.

classes.name: UrlItem
classes.description: Data class representing media item metadata with URLs and details

classes.name: Category
classes.description: Data class representing a category of media items, with a list of MediaItem objects

classes.name: MediaItem
classes.description: Data class representing a media item with UI resource IDs and metadata

methods.name: categories
methods.description: Returns list of all categories with media items

methods.name: recommended
methods.description: Returns list of recommended media items

methods.name: topPicks
methods.description: Returns list of top picks media items

methods.name: recentlyAdded
methods.description: Returns list of recently added media items

methods.name: bannerBackgrounds
methods.description: Returns list of banner background image URLs

methods.name: byId
methods.description: Finds a media item by its ID

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches for media items by query across title and overview
